programme.desc: Juventus return to Serie A action as they travel to face Cagliari at Unipol Domus. How will Juve respond after their disappointing UEFA Champions League exit?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Napoli host Inter at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Can the champions stop Inter's title charge, or will the Nerazzurri dominate in Naples?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action from San Siro as AC Milan face Lazio. Can the Rossoneri secure a crucial win, or will Lazio stun them in Milan?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A clash as Lazio host Udinese at Stadio Olimpico. Can Lazio continue their push for Europe, or will Udinese cause an upset in Rome?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Juventus take on Atalanta at the Allianz Stadium. A crucial battle for the top four-can Juve assert dominance, or will Atalanta strike in Turin?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A showdown as Fiorentina host Juventus at the Stadio Artemio Franchi. Can Fiorentina rise to the challenge, or will Juve take control in Florence?

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles take on GWS Giants at Optus Stadium. Can finals hopefuls the Giants avoid a slip up against the bottom-placed Eagles?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face Gold Coast Suns at Marvel Stadium. Can the injury-hit Bombers put a dent in the Suns' top-eight push?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Geelong Cats take on Richmond at GMHBA Stadium. The Tigers have not won on the Cats' home deck since 2006.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as Brisbane Lions and Port Adelaide face-off at the Gabba. Can the Lions avoid an upset against the resurgent Power?

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Action from the Women's National Basketball Association as Seattle Storm travel to face New York Liberty at the Barclays Center. The Storm beat Liberty 89-79 back in June.

programme.title: Global Champions Tour
programme.desc: Coverage of the Longines Global Champions Tour and the 2025 Grand Prix of Monaco, as the best riders in the world compete in a breathtaking waterfront setting.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Angling magazine show presented by Rob Hughes and Andy Ford, featuring the 2025 Sea Angling Classic.

programme.title: Ultra-Trail World Series

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: De & family goes on a drive to Changbai Mountain, where their magical holiday turns tragic when their 8-year-old son goes missing. Will they be able to find him before the cold winter takes him?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Andy Lau and Eric Tsang star in this thriller about a mole in the police department and an undercover cop, both of whom go all out to expose each other.

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behavior and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. When he meets his teenage nephew who is ashamed of his stutter, the two develop a special friendship through mutual understanding.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: In this 39th Hong Kong Film Award winner, a newly-engaged woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander. Will she be able to free herself from her past?

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays an agent - and target - for busting a billion-dollar drug deal. Now, can he defend himself from the beautiful assassin sent to take him down?

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: In this Golden Horse winner starring Gordon Lam, a retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian drug mule.

programme.title: Happy Dragons
programme.desc: Four retired secret agents embark on a quest for the 'Golden Relic' which turns back time and restores their youth. As they strive to rectify past mistakes, they unravel a hidden conspiracy.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: A top-rated film based on a true case in Hong Kong, it tells of a young man who plots with his friend to murder & dismember his parents, resulting in a highly controversial court case.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling, who dreams of becoming a secret agent, accidentally rescues an injured spy. He agrees to make her his apprentice, turning her upside down as she goes on madcap adventures.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu waits 10 years for her first love, who marries another. Losing faith, she meets a wedding planner and a wealthy man, both offering solace. Torn between them, who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The HK Police placed over a thousand undercover officers in various triads, attempting to bring down the country's largest criminal organization, prompting betrayal, deceit & murder.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: An average high-school girl, May is on a quest to win the love of her school heartthrob. However, May has a secret: she shoots electricity whenever she gets excited.

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Perfect
programme.desc: Heartbroken after a breakup, a woman meets a rich tycoon who is under disguise as his driver to escape his conflict. They fall in love soon after, with her completely ignorant of his true identity.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: Zhang Yi Mou's first spy thriller follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret mission in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo - only to be sold out by a traitor.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: From the award-winning team behind the mind-blowing blockbuster, the secrets, finally revealed in this highly anticipated prequel

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: A photographer becomes entangled with a woman in red, leading to the deaths of his relatives. When the girl he likes dies mysteriously, he uncovers the secret of a 'ghost marriage'.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: A Hong Kong megastar decides to make a film about rural China to win an award at a film festival. He experiences village life for a farmer's role, but this results in a series of hilarious events.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: Mei Jing leads the Thunderbolt Women's Commando Unit to infiltrate the drug cartel in Dong Zhou area, but they were ambushed and her father's identity as an undercover is exposed.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Featuring an all HK-star cast, this movie depicts how a weatherman is faced with the biggest challenge of his life when he receives a shocking forecast.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as the Asian Hawk, a top agent sent to retrieve the bronze heads of twelve animals of the Chinese Zodiac, stolen in Beijing in 1860.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: Liao Jie and his father save to buy a home but are too poor. Liao Jie learns survival skills from their landlord Old Fox and ends up hurting him, but his empathy stops him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: Featuring 3 urban ghost stories; a famous actor is haunted after he hit a girl while driving; a taxi driver is being drained dry by a ghost; a ghost child wanders a soon-to-be demolished mall.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: To make a living, Teddy accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. His career regains momentum after reunites with his long-lost daughter.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: This inspiring drama features how a widow cheerfully forges on as a supermarket check-out girl in a remote border town to support her only son.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: As a decade-long tunnel project reaches completion, an earthquake strikes, forcing a retired soldier & his son to stop the disasters at the source, or risk the community - and the tunnel.
